version_description: New Games

You asked and we listened! We’re delighted to introduce Todo Maths 4.0, one of our biggest updates yet. This update includes:
- New Level E for More Advanced Learners Eager to Be Challenged
- Level Finder to Help Find the Right Skill Level for Your Child
- Two New Mini-Games: Circus Train and Hundreds Puzzle
- Improved Parents Page

Get ready for fun in the sun! This update introduces a charming summer theme, complete with new seasonal backgrounds, cool collectibles and much more. Enjoy the heat, but don’t forget your sunscreen!

Love Todo Maths? Give us a 5-star rating & review — it really helps us out!

Thank you for using Todo Maths! This update brings you Level F, a brand-new skill level with more advanced curriculum that builds upon Level E to introduce more intermediate 2nd Grade content!

We’ve also added 4 NEW GAMES — Pictograph I, Pictograph II, Ruler I and Ruler II. These games reinforce important data and measurement concepts that correspond directly to skills learned in the classroom. The new Measurement and Data category has been added to Free Choice mode and to the Challenge modes in Level E and Level F to provide easy access.

Love Todo Maths? Give us a 5-star rating and review — it really helps us out!

Todo Math is back renewed!
[Back-to-school updates] by the winner of a global educational software competition
- Added levels E and F to DAILY ADVENTURE
- Added 3 new games
- Added new Mission app
- Added 20 new monsters

Let's go on a new adventure with Todo Math!

The days are getting longer and the sun is out, that means it’s time for the Todo Math springtime update! This update adds the new spring graphical theme, which includes some beautiful and seasonally appropriate backgrounds, collectible outfits and rides to the game.
We’ve also improved performance and fixed a bug that caused the game to crash for a small number of users.
Love Todo Math? Give us a 5-star rating and review ― it really helps us out!

School’s out for summer! It’s time for learning and fun in the sun with Todo Math’s new summer theme. Don’t forget your bathing suit! This update also fixes a small bug and improves general performance.
Love Todo Math? Give us a 5-star rating and review on the App Store — it really helps us out!

You asked and we listened! This update introduces a fully revamped Parents Page that was built with ease-of-use in mind. The new and improved Parents Page features an updated UI that makes it easier than ever to view subscription info, change profile settings, or manage your account.

Thank you for using Todo Math! This update brings you Level F, a brand-new skill level with more advanced curriculum that builds upon Level E to introduce more intermediate 2nd Grade content!

We’ve also added 4 NEW GAMES — Pictograph I, Pictograph II, Ruler I and Ruler II. These games reinforce important data and measurement concepts that correspond directly to skills learned in the classroom. The new Measurement and Data category has been added to Free Choice mode and to the Challenge modes in Level E and Level F to provide easy access.

In accordance with the new Global Data Protection Regulation, a law that takes effect in European Union territories on May 25, 2018, we’ve added a few in-app messages for you to read about data collection, and you’ll be asked for consent whenever appropriate.

We’ve also added a new feature to the Parent page that allows you to decline our simple data collection if you so choose. We only collect data to help us improve the app through updates and to provide you with better customer support and additional services.

Thanks so much for supporting Todo Maths! Love our app? Give us a 5-star rating and review — it really helps us out!

School’s out for summer! It’s time for learning and fun in the sun with Todo Maths' new summer theme. Don’t forget your bathing suit! This update also fixes a small bug and improves general performance.

Love Todo Maths? Give us a 5-star rating and review on the App Store — it really helps us out!

Included in this update:
• New summer seasonal theme
• Fixes a bug that a limited number of users experienced in the multi-digit grid game
• Improves general performance

Welcome back to school! Kick-off the school year with Todo Math’s new fall theme and jump ahead of the curve. This update also fixes a small bug and improves general performance.
Love Todo Math? Give us a 5-star rating and review on the App Store — it really helps us out!

Wintertime is here again! This update introduces the new Todo Math winter theme. Progress through the snowy map and solve fun math problems to unlock a bunch of COOL seasonal collectibles and rides for Tally. Don’t forget your scarf and gloves!

Included in this Update:
- Seasonal Winter Theme
- Minor Bug Fixes & Gameplay Improvements

Todo Math is back renewed!
Global Learning XPRIZE winner Enuma is now providing:
* Enhanced the multiplication games and multiplication reading feature (advanced operation).
* Added a Korean coin game (for the Korean language setting).
* The pattern game has been updated with familiar objects.
* Added a volume setting (Parents menu).
* Added a function for downloading essential data.
* Modified other minor elements and fixed some bugs.

Todo Math is back renewed!
Global Learning XPRIZE winner Enuma is now providing:
* Added feature to suggest the appropriate level.
* Rocket Launch: Control and Help button updated.
* Parent's Page: Fixed bug in lesson details.
* Profile: Fixed bug in lesson history.
* Tracing: Modified the number 4 (Korean, Chinese, Japanese).
* Challenge Mode: Incorrectly answered questions do not reappear.
* Modified some sound effects.
* Word Grocery: Fixed bug (Japanese).
* Revised Translation: Chinese.
* Expanded application support for left-handed options.
* Modified other minor elements and fixed some bugs.
Let's go on a new adventure with Todo Math!
